questions.question: Why is it important to analyze use cases in the 'Understanding Objectives and Audience' stage?

answers.b: To identify how VR addresses specific problems
answers.c: To decide on system performance metrics

questions.question: What is a primary consideration when focusing on immersion and interaction in VR?

answers.b: Defining the environment, characters, and rules
answers.c: Enhancing user engagement through interactive design

questions.question: What is a critical factor in ensuring the technical feasibility of a VR concept?

answers.b: Ensuring compatibility with VR hardware capabilities
